title: Blood Tutorial
description:
[http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=286998267](http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=286998267)
This page covers pretty much everything you need to help get the game running.
Steam version and GOG Version are the same. They both use DOSBox.
In order to get the game running well you're going to need to do some changes in dosboxBlood.conf
To get rid of cutscenes (which is recommended as they usually will mess up the resolution) go into BLOOD.INI and simply
delete the text after CutSceneA= and CutWavA= and so on with CutSceneB, etc.
By default the game plays OGG music tracks, this will show you how to play MIDI tracks instead of the OGG tracks.
First scroll down to the bottom of dosboxBlood.conf and find the autoexec lines.
Change: imgmount D game.inst -t iso
To: imgmount D game.gog -t iso
And enjoy your MIDI music!
BMouse is allowed in speedruns and you can find out how to use it in the link above.
